org.jooq
Interface Select

All Superinterfaces:
Query, QueryPartProvider, QueryProvider<SelectQuery>, ResultProviderQuery<Record>, SelectFromStep, SelectGroupByStep, SelectJoinStep, SelectOrderByStep, SelectStep, SelectWhereStep, java.io.Serializable
public interface Select
extends SelectStep, ResultProviderQuery<Record>

A simpler version of the SelectQuery

This object is a wrapper for an actual SelectQuery, only exposing a small API to allow you to model your SQL statements in Java as if they were actual SQL statements.

Example: 

 Select query = QueryFactory.createSelect();

 query.select(field1, field2)
      .from(table1)
      .join(table2).on(field1.equal(field2))
      .where(field1.greaterThan(100))
      .orderBy(field2);
 query.execute(connection);

 System.out.println(query.getResult());

Use the IDE of your choice to see how simple it is to create an SQL statement like that

Author:
Lukas Eder
